# Special edition session - Perlin

![][13]![][14]

 _Perlin's CTO, Kenta Iwasaki will be demonstrating [how to](https://www.playgroundfx.com/blog/forex-trading-how-to/) build a DApp
using Perlin + Wavelet_

DApps Dev Club is holding special edition session with Perlin, on
Tuesday, 6th August. You will learn [how to](https://www.playgroundfx.com/blog/forex-trading-how-to/) build a DApp using Perlin
Wavelet using less than 100 lines of code, and will be conducted by
[Kenta][15], Perlin's CTO, and co-founder!

[**RSVP now!**][16]

Here's what you need to know!

## Event

The session will be held at [Chainstack's][17] office in Suntec City.

Thanks Ashlie for helping us run the event!

Note that we'll be starting slightly earlier than usual - at 6:00pm
instead of 6:30pm.

## Topics

We will have the usual DApps Dev Club introduction, for those of you
coming for your first session.

Kenta will be doing the heavy lifting though - he will show us just how
easy it is to develop and deploy a decentralised application on the
Perlin network, and using their Wavelet platform. We will build a chat
DApp using <100 lines of code.

## Preparation

Bring your laptops, with NodeJs v10 or later, and any code editor that
supports Typescript (e.g. IntelliJ, WebStorm or VS Code).

If you are extra keen, check out the following resources as well:

  * [AssemblyScript][18]
  * [Rust version of this workshop][19]

Note that we will **not** be using Rust in this workshop ðŸ˜….

If you have any questions, please ask away in our [chat group][20]. We
also have a brand new [Telegram announcements channel][21].

## Next session

[**RSVP** on eventbrite][16]

a€¦ it helps us plan for seating, ordering F&B, et cetera.

See you all again soon!
